personas.content: I'm stuck at the condition where I need to check if the sum is odd. Can you help?
Sure! Do you remember which operator helps you determine if a number is odd or even?
Is it the modulus operator?
Exactly! You can use `%` to check if the sum divided by 2 leaves a remainder. If it does, the number is odd.
Got it, so the condition should be `sum % 2 != 0`?
Yes, that's correct! Well done.
Okay, now I got an error saying 'SyntaxError: invalid syntax' when running my code. Any idea why?
Let's double-check your code. Often, missing colons or mismatched parentheses can cause syntax errors. Can you look for any of those?
Oh, I missed a colon after the `if` statement!
Great catch! Adding that should fix the error.
Alright, I added it and no more errors, but I'm not getting any output.
Make sure you have a `print()` statement inside your `if` block to display the output.
I see, I forgot to print something. Thanks!
No problem, keep going! You're making progress.
This is still pretty confusing sometimes, especially remembering all the operators.
It's normal to find it tricky at first. Practice and repetition will definitely help!
Yeah, I suppose working through these exercises will get easier with time.
Definitely. You're doing great, just keep practicing those logical checks and you'll master them!
I'll try to finish this exercise on my own now. Thanks for your help!
You're welcome! Don't hesitate to reach out if you need more assistance. Good luck!
